name: Out of Mana!
description:
Created for UDC Jam Week #16, check out our discord!

SO FAR THIS IS MULTIPLAYER ONLY YOU"LL PROBABLY NEED A FRIEND

First version created just short of 9 days, please let us know what you think in the comments below. 

///HOW TO PLAY\\\
